sunpump_launcher.description: SunPump bonding-curve launcher — handles token creation, purchase, and sale

sunswap_v2_router.description: SunSwap V2 router — tokens migrate here after bonding curve completes

sunpump_launcher.description: SunPump launcher on Nile testnet (verify before use)

purchaseToken.name: purchaseToken
purchaseToken.description: Buy tokens by sending TRX as callValue. minTokensExpected provides slippage protection.

saleToken.name: saleToken
saleToken.description: Sell tokens for TRX. amountMin is minimum TRX to receive (slippage protection). Requires token approval first.

getPrice.name: getPrice
getPrice.description: Returns current token price on the bonding curve.

getTokenState.name: getTokenState
getTokenState.description: Returns token lifecycle state (0=active on bonding curve, 1=migrated to SunSwap).

getTokenAmountByPurchaseWithFee.name: getTokenAmountByPurchaseWithFee
getTokenAmountByPurchaseWithFee.description: Estimate tokens received and fee for a given TRX purchase amount.

getTrxAmountBySaleWithFee.name: getTrxAmountBySaleWithFee
getTrxAmountBySaleWithFee.description: Estimate TRX received and fee for selling a given token amount.

getExactTrxAmountForSaleWithFee.name: getExactTrxAmountForSaleWithFee
getExactTrxAmountForSaleWithFee.description: Calculate tokens needed to sell to receive an exact TRX amount.

createAndInitPurchase.name: createAndInitPurchase
createAndInitPurchase.description: Create a new meme token and optionally make an initial purchase. Requires mint fee (20 TRX) + optional purchase TRX as callValue.

approve.name: approve
approve.description: Standard TRC20 approve — must be called on the TOKEN contract (not SunPump) before selling.

balanceOf.name: balanceOf
balanceOf.description: Standard TRC20 balanceOf — call on the TOKEN contract to check holdings.

allowance.name: allowance
allowance.description: Standard TRC20 allowance — check how much the SunPump contract can spend.

notes.trading_fee: 1% fee on all buys and sells on the bonding curve
notes.token_decimals: SunPump meme tokens typically use 18 decimals
notes.bonding_curve_cap: Bonding curve completes at ~$69,420 market cap, then tokens migrate to SunSwap V2
notes.approval_before_sell: You MUST approve the SunPump launcher contract to spend your tokens before calling saleToken
notes.slippage: Always use slippage protection (minTokensExpected / amountMin). Recommended: 1-5% for stable trades, up to 10-15% for volatile new tokens
